thread.title: Classic Hotel next to Fontana di Trevi
thread.title_full: Classic Hotel next to Fontana di Trevi - Review of Hotel delle Nazioni, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Feras_El_Dib
title: Classic Hotel next to Fontana di Trevi
text:
A classic hotel at a perfect location in Rome....next to Trevi fountain...the shopping street of Via del Corso....Galleria Alberto Sordi....several restaurants surrounding the hotel....a supermarket and several cafes
The staff were extremely friendly and offered immediate assistance.
Our room was spacious and good however the bathrooms need to be updated and modernized.
Wifi was ok however it needs improvement by facilitating the logging in procedure.
Breakfast was ok....however it lacked variety... I wold recommend adding more italian food and pastry
I would also recommend adding kettles or Nespresso Machines to the rooms
